tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    amount_paid DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
